definition[0]: the hard pointed thing that grows, usually in pairs, on the heads of animals such as cows and goats
definition[1]: the substance that animals’ horns are made of
example[0]: a knife with a horn handle
definition[2]: a part of an animal’s head that sticks out like a horn, for example on a snail
definition[3]: the thing in a vehicle that you use to make a loud sound as a signal or warning
note[0]: sound/toot/honk/blow your horn (=make a noise with your horn)
definition[4]: a musical instrument like a long metal tube that is wide at one end, that you play by blowing
definition[7]: a musical instrument made from an animal’s horn
